siren

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • siren.Action

  • public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an available behavior an entity exposes.
    Since:
    8/13/17
    Author:
    jonfreer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action(java.lang.String name,
              java.net.URI href)
        Constructs an instance of Action.
        Parameters:
        name - A string that identifies the action to be performed. Action names MUST be unique within the set of actions for an entity. The behaviour of clients when parsing a Siren document that violates this constraint is undefined.
        href - The URI of the action.

      • Action

        public Action(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              HttpMethod method,
              java.net.URI href,
              java.util.List<Field> fields,
              java.lang.String type,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> klass)
        Constructs an instance of Action.
        Parameters:
        name - A string that identifies the action to be performed. Action names MUST be unique within the set of actions for an entity. The behaviour of clients when parsing a Siren document that violates this constraint is undefined.
        title - Descriptive text about the action.
        method - An enumerated attribute mapping to a protocol method. For HTTP, these values may be GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, or PATCH. As new methods are introduced, this list can be extended. If this attribute is omitted, GET should be assumed.
        href - The URI of the action.
        fields - Represent controls inside of actions.
        type - The encoding type for the request.
        klass - Describes the nature of an action based on the current representation. Possible values are implementation-dependent and should be documented.

      • Action

        public Action(Action action)
        Copy constructor. Construct a new Action instance based on the Action instance provided.
        Parameters:
        action - The Action to copy.

    • Method Detail

      • getKlass

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getKlass()
        Retrieves the class for the action. The class describes the nature of an action based on the current representation. Possible values are implementation-dependent and should be documented.
        Returns:
        The class of the action.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Retrieves the name of the action. The name identifies the action to be performed.
        Returns:
        The name of the action.

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Retrieves the title of the action. The title is descriptive text about the action.
        Returns:
        The title of the action.

      • getMethod

        public HttpMethod getMethod()
        Retrieves the method of the action. The method is an enumerated attribute mapping to a protocol method.
        Returns:
        The method of the action.

      • getHref

        public java.lang.String getHref()
        Retrieves the href of the action. The herf is the URI of the action.
        Returns:
        The href of the action.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Retrieves the type of the action. The type is the encoding type for the request.
        Returns:
        The type of the action.

      • getFields

        public java.util.List<Field> getFields()
        Retrieves the fields associated with the action.
        Returns:
        The fields associated with the action.
